Reviews.Title: “Excellent budget hotel, even better location!”
Reviews.Author: lisey_lambo
Reviews.Content: excellent budget hotel brilliant location close termini main train station close walking distance metro bus links excellent hotel base exploring city basic furnishings tv fridge wet shower hairdryer staff friendly helpful breakfast literally bread jam coffee absolutely fine busy day ahead considering hotel cheap exactly expected perfect stay rome definitely recommend friends brilliant budget hotel frills flew airport booked bus transport city terravision

Reviews.Title: “Honeymoon in Rome”
Reviews.Author: samflyer
Reviews.Content: 2 weeks europe nights rome hotel solid 2 star hotel previous reviews accurate heres bad bad bathroom shower curtain wet air conditioner cool furnishings spartan low quality breakfast sparse bakery 2 blocks street elevator 23 person max wifi available doesnt connection 5th floor thats price elevator internet available floor via public computer safe close restaurants train station central attractions staff helpful friendly double paned glass windows offers quiet noisy streets overall acceptable hotel

Reviews.Title: “Decent enough”
Reviews.Author: JCYL
Reviews.Content: stayed 3 nights clean tidy service provided safety lockers provided tv nice breakfast free coffee choice provided everyday staff nice helpful offered hire taxi airport 4am wifi free internet provided lobby connection okay located close train station bus stations metro station walks bit unsafe late night overall decent hostel price range stay hostel visit rome
